serverside.managers

Class ServerManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverside.managers.ServerManagement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ServerManagement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    Class description: Manager for the server side of the game. Runs Tic Tac Toe Server and manages the socket of the server. This class observes the object input stream of the sockets.
    Version:
    September 24, 2019
    Author:
    806547 Holly Harnack
